description_for_human: Multi-industry platform for pizza ordering, IT services from Troon Technologies, and fashion shopping.
description_for_model: IndustryConnect AI provides three main services: 1) Pizza Paradise - browse menu and order pizzas with delivery, 2) Troon Technologies - explore blockchain, AI/ML, and web development services with contact form, 3) Fashion Factory - shop premium clothing and apparel. Use getPizzaMenu and orderPizza for food orders, getTroonServices and contactTroon for IT inquiries, getFashionCatalog and purchaseFashionItem for clothing shopping.
